results.title: PECULIARITIES OF PHARMACOTHERAPY IN ARTERIAL HYPERTENSION AND COMORBID PATHOLOGY.
results.journal: Rev Med Chir Soc Med Nat Iasi
results.text_hl: MATERIAL AND METHODS: 60 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@AH@@@, @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@ and @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ were divided into three groups: 1st group was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ (regimen I); 2nd group was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ (regimen II); 3rd group was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ (regimen III).

citations.NLM: Tofan N, Marish M, Shtanko V. PECULIARITIES OF PHARMACOTHERAPY IN ARTERIAL HYPERTENSION AND COMORBID PATHOLOGY. Rev Med Chir Soc Med Nat Iasi. 2015 Oct-Dec;119(4):1092-7. PMID: 26793854
citations.BibTeX: @article{26793854, title={PECULIARITIES OF PHARMACOTHERAPY IN ARTERIAL HYPERTENSION AND COMORBID PATHOLOGY.}, author={Tofan N and Marish M and Shtanko V}, journal={Rev Med Chir Soc Med Nat Iasi}, volume={119}, number={4}, pages={1092-7}}
